text: Now there was a strong tower in the middle of the city, and all the men and women and all the lords of the city fled there, shutting themselves in and going up to the roof of the tower.
In each he put a garrison to harass Israel.

V. The Journey to Jerusalem: Luke's Travel Narrative - Departure for Jerusalem; Samaritan Inhospitality. When the days for his being taken up were fulfilled, he resolutely determined to journey to Jerusalem,
